original_text: Better is the poor that walketh in his integrity, than he that is perverse in his lips, and is a fool.
korean_text: 가난하여도 성실하게 행하는 자는 입술이 패역하고 미련한 자보다 나으니라

sentences.original_text: Better is the poor that walketh in his integrity
sentences.korean_translation: 정직하게 행하는 가난한 자가 더 낫다

sentences.original_text: than he that is perverse in his lips
